reviews.review:
I have debated whether or not to post a review about this game because I always seem to want to when the game has a lot of issues; however, with 500 hours on the game it has to be good right?
 
Unfortunately this game used to be a funny way to spend time with friends and has now turned into a game that alienates long-time players with terrible updates that only seem to be profit driven.  I cannot remember the last update that did not involve a DLC and I cannot remember an update that was released that didn't result in multiple bugs that are still unfixed to this day.  The golden years of this game are long gone and this game is headed to be uninstalled... I am begging you not to buy if you are interested.

This game is honestly one of my favorite games I own. It is super fun to either play solo or with a group of friends. It can be a tad anxiety inducing so if you have issues with that maybe this game isn't right for you, or maybe play it in small bits if you really want to give it a go! 10/10 would recommend :)

Possibly the worst community of any game. Devs have abandoned it. Reporting someone makes no difference regardless of prof bacause reports are never read. Survivor with friends are OP. Killers tunneling and camping are often the best strat, making the game a "1 min idle, then 1 min spam the spacebar before you lose the game simulator" for one survivor almost every game.
